attributes.action: Introduce new law to ensure planning  application for new telegraph poles
attributes.additional_details: I have had a pole erected less than 4 metres from my windows .. spoiling what was a fantastic view, Open Reach are being unhelpful, on researching it is happening all over , we were not given any notice so could not object.
attributes.background: Ensure telecoms companies apply for planning & inform residents prior to erecting new telegraph poles

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Remove Permitted Development Rights for all additional telecoms infrastructure. - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700333
